Package it.polimi.ingsw.psp1.santorini.network

Class ServerHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.psp1.santorini.network.ServerHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
NetHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
CLIServerHandler, GuiServerHandler
public abstract class ServerHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements NetHandler
Manages the communication between clients and server
